name: First Aid Only 10-Person OSHA First Aid Kit
description: Compact kit ideal for small teams, meeting OSHA and ANSI Class A standards.
target_audience_match: Perfect for small business owners who just need to meet the basics without overthinking safety compliance.

description: Comprehensive kit for medium-sized teams, ensuring readiness for common workplace injuries.
target_audience_match: Great for site managers juggling daily hazards and mid-sized crews who need to stay compliant.

name: First Aid Only 100-Person OSHA First Aid Cabinet
description: Extensive cabinet suitable for large teams, meeting OSHA and ANSI Class B requirements.

name: Proguard Large OSHA First Aid Kit with Eyewash
description: Enhanced kit with eyewash station, suitable for environments with chemical exposure.

name: Vitalfour OSHA-A First Aid Kit for 1-10 Persons
